page.title: 07Family life in Swindon.
page.content: My mum is called Lorraine.She works in an office and her hobbies are decorating cakes,keep fit, and dressmaking. Dad works in building construction and his hobbies are guitar playing, model-making,carpentry and Kung Fu. My sister Sarah is 9 years old and she plays the guitar, draws and goes to Brownies. My name is Robert and I am 11 years old. I play the flute, make models,collect stamps and Action Force. { On Saturday morning I go to ballet class and in the afternoon I go into town or listen to records with my friend. On Sundays my family go out for a walk to Coate Water or visit places like Avebury, Savernake Forest. We also go to the South Marsdon Country Club for a swim.
